website_summaries.verdict: A cheaper option for women wishing to invest in a reliable pair of running underwear.
pros: Customers rave over the ultra-soft, comfortable material
Available in a number of different colors and designs
cons: A few customers complained that the panties have trouble staying in place

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...almost
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the best seamless, moisture wicking underwear of my extensive collection. I've been on the hunt for the perfect underwear to wear while running and these are the best I've found so far. Sorry Under Armour and Lululemon, you don't hold a candle to these babies! Four stars out of five because sometimes the edges roll when pants are pulled up over them, and have to be smoothed down to achieve that seamless look. They're super soft and comfortable for miles of running!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are great. They fit as expected (I'm 5' 7" and 162 pounds and have worn a size "medium" underwear for the last 10+ years). I bought one pair initially, then bought two more. They are super lite-weight and extremely comfortable. They tend to roll a bit at the edges if you're pulling leggings up over them, but generally they stay in place and don't move around while exercising. So far they've washed and worn well, and I plan to get even more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Drew

customer_reviews.title: These are great underwear for the gym
customer_reviews.text: These are great underwear for the gym. No panty lines and very comfortable. Stay in place don't ride up. Will be buying more. They do run on the small side. I wear size 10-12 and got the M/L and would definitely buy a bigger size if they were available. Overall these are great, much more comfortable than the Under Armour and Reebok brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: moisture-wicking, does what it's meant to do
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars had it not been for the fact that it gives me an annoying wedgie the whole day if I wore it with anything other than fitted pants. Bought an S/M based on the sizing chart with hips around 98-100cm. No complaints with its softness, no digging of the seams what-so-ever and great moisture wicking properties. Wore it with black capris to gym for a sweaty session and it worked well. Shows very faint panty lines but not to the point that I was bothered by it at all. Wished it fit better
customer_reviews.author: mk-amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They fit perfectly, they look nice, I don't get sweaty and they feel soooo comfortable. I have always used regular underwear to workout but I got tired of feeling sweaty and the regular underwear just wouldn't stay in place. These are just perfect. I was afraid to get the wrong size as there are only 2 choices (XS/S and M/L) but they are very stretchy and they fit perfectly. I totally recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: ERod

customer_reviews.title: I run, box, and weight train. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I run, box, and weight train. I have a bubble butt and thick thighs so most running underwear doesn't really stay put on me.. I bought the XL in these and after 2 wears, once for boxing and once for leg day) I immediately went and bought 2 more pairs. I wore only these this past weekend when I had two 5Ks in 2 days and not once did I chafe or feel pinched. Am buying more in other colors so I can have plenty to wear as my every day underwear.
customer_reviews.author: mary beth perrin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Breathable Underwear For The Active Woman!  They Keep You Cool & Dry!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these active underwear! I use them for long distance running, working out, chasing my toddler around, and even just every day wear. They are made of an EXTREMELY BREATHABLE fabric. They keep you cool and dry even if the rest of your body is dripping sweat. They stay in place while you are running too! They have a very comfortable waist and they have held up very well during many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey U.

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight, and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: As an active woman, I needed breathable lightweight underwear. I came across these at my local Sport Chalet (which was going out of business so I got these for cheap) bough two pair and LOVE THEM. You barely notice they are even on your body. They don’t bunch up or give you wedgies... so, that’s a total win win for me! Loll I’m happy I was able to find more here on Amazon... I wear these daily. I guess if you’re a more practical, active person, you’d love these as much as I do. No more Victoria’s Secret for me! Hahahaha
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater Soul

customer_reviews.title: The best underwear...ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these underwear. The fit is very comfortable! I usually wear a size 8 and the large/XL size is just right. I accidently ordered the XS/SM once and that pair does tend to ride, where the LG/XL size does not. The seem does show through slightly, depending on the material I'm wearing over it. I keep buying more so I don't have to wash them as frequently. I have played soccer, volleyball, and basketball in them. They also accomodate panty liners nicely.
customer_reviews.author: BBach78

customer_reviews.title: Wedgie city
customer_reviews.text: I'm a field archaeologist and hiker and am looking for undies that can be comfortable all day. These are pretty good. The fabric is breathable and drys quickly. My only complaint is that migrate quite a bit through a hike or long walk. Probably will keep looking for something a little better.
customer_reviews.author: WhatI'dGive

customer_reviews.title: Want to like but can’t.
customer_reviews.text: So I love the material. It feels almost like you’re wearing nothing. I ordered size according to size chart and I should have sized up. I took them right off because the material starting rolling instantly. I imagine it will be that way unless you have no stomach or butt. I’m losing weight so will see if they do better a couple pounds less.
customer_reviews.author: kyeager

customer_reviews.title: They do keep you cool all day and even when working out
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed reviews about this. I wear a size 8 pants and purchased a medium. They do keep you cool all day and even when working out. They didn't ride up while I was at work. I did wear them to a kickboxing class and they rode and bunched like crazy, but I was nice and cool. Maybe they are just too big for me? I still have high hopes and will be trying them again- this time on a run.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley S.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and light. They basically show no lines which I love. I wear them for exercise mainly but have worn them under my regular clothes. I ordered a size up from my normal based on the reviews and I think they are a tad too big. However, I don't know if my regular size would have fit or if they would have been too small. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Yogamom05

customer_reviews.title: I prefer a tight fit. Order size down unless you are worried about it riding up.
customer_reviews.text: If you have issues with staying dry, buy these. If you are a runner or athlete. Buy these. Now. Stop reading my review and and type in adidas climalite in the search box. Buy 5 pairs. Your nether regions will thank you. Do not worry about the price, it pays for itself because dry=less bladder and yeast infections.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great underwear!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! They are fantastic for exercise, hiking, traveling internationally (long plane rides get uncomfortable in the wrong underwear!), or just wearing because they are super comfortable! The sizing guide was correct- I had no issue with them being too big or too small. Also, the cut of them is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, stays in place even through an intense workout. They don't roll down or give me a wedgie when I'm on the bike like other panties do. I wear a junior size 13, and i ordered a Med/large. They aren't totally seamless but the line you do see is thin enough that it's forgivable. I've bought like 5 pairs I love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeRTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The best exercise underwear ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love Adidas in general and these are the best underwear for exercising! Was so lucky to find these in gray as they sold out of my size on their website. They fit as expected for a multi-sized item. A bit small for me but I am usually an XS or a small and these run in inbetween sized, small/medium and large/extra large.
customer_reviews.author: A.Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Good wicking fabric, but a little bit small...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before our trip to Mexico because I knew it was going to be super hot and humid. They really do wick away moisture and work well. Small is small, but worked ok. I have subtracted a star because the crotch is abnormally narrow! Kind of strange. But over all these are good. I was able to wash a pair, wear another etc.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and do exactly what they are supposed to. I now hate working out in regular underwear. These are also great for a hot day!
customer_reviews.author: Julia H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workoutwear
customer_reviews.text: I bought and wore these for a triathlon and haven't thought about them until right now, writing this review. Wore these under biker shorts. I swam, biked, and then ran. What more can you ask for than not even giving a thought to your underwear? So, I guess they're perfect. I'm 5'6, 129 lbs and I ordered a M/L.
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I love these so much, I bought one pair, and ended up buying three more. They look great and feel great, and I can pay what you'd pay at the mall ( Victoria's secret) but for something that is lasting me longer, and easier to care for. They'd be great for backpacking or traveling, as they are quicker to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Ride up and panty lines
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are a waste if money! The underwear ride up and panty lines are very visible with leggings..... I bought both nude and black and wore different leggings, both were very visible. They're no good for exercise unless you want to pull out a wedgie every few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The M/L fit perfect. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My pant size is 28 (I'm 5'5" and 120 lbs but I have a tummy). The M/L fit perfect. Good quality, just what I wanted for running, but I may get more so I can wear them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not flattering
customer_reviews.text: The color description is completely off. They are a light grey, like a men’s undershirt, and the seam is not black, it’s grey. There’s not one fleck of Black. They are not flattering at all. However, they are comfortable and breathable, so I guess I will use them for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra K.

customer_reviews.title: A little big, the color is off, but overall a pretty good buy
customer_reviews.text: So when I bought these I decided to get a few of the grey static heather/matte silver and I was disappointed by how thin they were and I thought after first trying them that they would be uncomfortable and ride up however I was wrong and they are very comfortable. The only down side was the color wasn’t like the picture and it was just a plain grey and was not the exsact cut that was desplayed in the picture and I would recommend getting a size smaller than you think you need.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited to wear these during a workout. They fit well and are cute- nothing special, but they are cute. They are seamless and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clune

customer_reviews.title: got the medium/large and while these do fit pretty good, they tend to get between you buttcheeks
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10, got the medium/large and while these do fit pretty good, they tend to get between you buttcheeks. VERY uncomfortable .Moisture wicking is excellent though. They do dry quickly. Overall a decent panty considering the price, however I prefer ExOfficio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: inspiring color, tiny undies
customer_reviews.text: not bad but kinda small in the crotch i try to stay loyal to my fave boys boxer briefs instead but these look so cool and bright
customer_reviews.author: plus ultra mega

customer_reviews.title: They are great to work out in
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go backpacking for 6 months in South America this last year. I was hoping they would dry out faster when I washed them by hand, but I guess I shouldn't expect miracles. It was damp the very next morning when I tried air drying them overnight. They are great to work out in. They are small and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: These underwear are fantastic. They truly feel like I am wearing nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are fantastic. They truly feel like I am wearing nothing at all. And it is nice that there is virtually no panty lines when wearing pants that typically reveal that very unattractive line. I figured I would wash them a few times before I posted a review and after three cycles they still appear to be holding up great. I will update this review if that changes soon. Very happy with the purchase. I have to say they also look pretty good by themselves. Adidas- you should use this cut to make swimsuits/ bikinis. :) I am a fairly athletic build- 5'9- usually wear a 6. I ordered the small. Fit great!
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Thin and comfortable, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, comfortable fit. They sent a solid light grey color rather than the color that I ordered. I purchased a large, I'm 5'7 140 lbs and they are slightly smaller than most. I do have an athletic butt and legs, 28 inch waist.
customer_reviews.author: Corporate Travel

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rides up pretty bad. Liked the adidas thongs, but unfortunately these didn’t work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine..
customer_reviews.text: I was buying this because I didn't want any lines under my yoga pants. Because of the seams, it still did show the lines. Product is fine...just not for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: XS was Large
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this was a one off issue with the size, but I ended returning this the moment I took it out of the box. It was obviously too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This underwear became a wedgie in two steps. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nash

customer_reviews.title: I have found love
customer_reviews.text: How did I never know about these?! Its going to cost a pretty penny ($10 a pair is a wee bit pricey) but these are my new 'go to'. Wish there was a large size (instead of a mix between medium and large). Super cute, crazy comfortable. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: MissWhitXO

customer_reviews.title: They wick moisture better than regular underwear but pretty average other than that
customer_reviews.text: They are ok, probably wouldn't buy them again.I wanted something for working out. They wick moisture better than regular underwear but pretty average other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Shara

customer_reviews.title: They feel great but you can still see the underwear lines under ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for working out in. They feel great but you can still see the underwear lines under my leggings. Plus they ride up your butt. Not worth the money in my opinion. I will not be getting any more of theses.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Great Venting!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, my new favorite underwear! I bought 1 and had to go back to order 3+ more. I live in AZ and in the summer no matter what you do, you will sweet! These are great and well ventilated so you don't feel like you are walking around...well...with swamp ass.
customer_reviews.author: ahotko

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: They become loose and saggy shortly after putting them on. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NWL5232

customer_reviews.title: Only if you enjoy the feeling of a thong.
customer_reviews.text: This fabric color is cute as pictured and it is very light and soft fabric. However, after my 2 kids I have an ass. Size 4, 5'5", 135 lbs and this pair was a wedgie nightmare. I work out HARD doing circuit training, weights, rowing, burpees, etc. I don't think I'll even wear these to work. I really hate them. My new theory is that most of these workout undies just don't stay put if you have a rear end. I don't think they would be completely seamless, but close, even though I don't care about that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The climacool fabric is amazing, you hardly notice that you are wearing panties
customer_reviews.text: The climacool fabric is amazing, you hardly notice that you are wearing panties, and you stay dry all day. Great for working out or busy days at work. They come in a fun range of fabrics too. To me they did seem to run a bit small, I ordered both sizes available and although I usually wear a small in other brands, I felt more comfortable in the M/L, but maybe I am just not used to wearing cheekster style. I highly recommend this panties and will probably be buying more in the future
customer_reviews.author: kelley feeley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a hot, humid summer!
customer_reviews.text: Very breathable. Has not lost it's shape yet. Keep in mind though, these cannot be thrown in the dryer, maybe that's why some people are having issues with it not retaining it's shape?
customer_reviews.author: StudentSeller981

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This underwear is super comfortable and perfect under light colored shorts or pants. They run small so I ordered a large (would normally get a small). I ordered one pair to try them out and have since ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite workout undies!!! Need several more pairs as nothing else will do. very breathable and the next best thing to going commando;).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product seems good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XS. The size on the underwear states XS/S, but fits bigger than it should, and a bit uncomfortable for workouts. The quality of the product seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Sporty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout underwear!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Second time buying these to replace my older pairs. These underwear are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE FOR RUNNING OR WORKING OUT IN!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these underwear. When I go on long runs, I definitely wear these!!! They stay in place and are super comfy and breathable. I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: waldo

customer_reviews.title: This product is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than I expected. The packaging reads" invisible" and it is- super light weight with no panty lines. I wasn't quite sure what climacool was, but now I know- the fabric breathes. It wicks away moisture so your sweat evaporates instead of leaving your yoga pants wet and sweaty. I will definetly buy more of these for working out and for everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bashan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this underwear!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!!! So comfy fit perfectly and are the first underwear that do NOT show panty lines. I have gotten multiple seamless underwear over the years and they still show lines these do not. I love them ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: wedgie central
customer_reviews.text: I like the material on these but if you have a larger bottom like I do then these will probably give you a wedgie all day. may as well wear the thong version.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Running? Not the underwear for you.
customer_reviews.text: If your in search of underwear to run in, look elsewhere. It's breathable yes, but definitely gives you a wedgie. I couldn't stand it after 2 miles. I'm 5-2, and 105lbs, got a xs/small. It fits somewhat too lose to stay in place but does fit.
customer_reviews.author: Hdix5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! So comfortable for working out but honestly I wear them all the time for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Zybak

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this at all. It rolls down at the waist and doesn't wick sweat. However, I'm stuck with it. As a result of my experience, I will never recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable for workouts
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable for workouts, walking around hot theme parks, exercising in general. Made a world of difference. Very breathable material. Will be ordering more for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes for these, but they ride up ...
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for these, but they ride up and give you a wedgie. There is not much elastic to keep the underwear on your butt.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby2010

customer_reviews.title: Best daily-wear underwear
customer_reviews.text: I am slowly switching all my underwear to these. They are super light, breathable, and don't show under clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Ioana Rusu

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed with the Adidas Climacool undies!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with the Adidas Climacool undies! I bought both the cheekster and the thong style. Overall I prefer the thong style for working out (just personal preference) but both styles are moisture wicking and so comfortable that you don't even feel like you're wearing any underwear! The package says they're "invisible" and that's definitely true...no panty lines! I'm typically a size small in other brands of underwear and the XS/S fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and lightweight. No panty lines. Ordered my regular size M, and fit just right
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit but don't last. After 6 washes the elastic is already droopy. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: N. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect undies!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! The material is very soft and thin. I usually wear an x-small in underwear, so I ordered the x-small/small. They were a tad big, but nothing to worry about! Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: NIGHTINGALE

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to do sport in
customer_reviews.text: Soft. Not transparent. Comfortable to do sport in. Wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. K.

customer_reviews.title: The best underwear for athletic build
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 more pairs of these Adidas underwear. They're so incredibly comfortable and look really cute on too. I can't stop gushing about these! They're breathable, don't show terrible underwear lines, don't cut into me at all! My new favorite underwear
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable workout undies I have, need to buy more, they are so comfortable it almost feels as if you don't even have anything on
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Favorite underwear!
customer_reviews.text: Great underwear! I wear these all the time for exercising and hiking! They're super breathable and comfortable-no problems with pinching or rolling. They're also thin enough that I can wear them under yoga pants or leggings without panty lines showing! I have three pair and plan on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for running. No panty line in tights and they stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: CGRRTX

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOOOOOOOO COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING. It's like not having anything on, but more comfortable! I have these on subscription! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: As close to perfect as I've found.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite underwear. I won't buy any others. They stay in place, don't run or shift, and I can barely feel their presence.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Love the underwear
customer_reviews.text: Love the underwear! Stays in place and super breathable. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I ordered the Grey Static Heather and the color I received was not at all like the picture. I received a solid very light grey pair. Still love them though!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Feel okay but not really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The panties crawl up a bit and are uncomfortable. I probably won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are really soft and lightweight. I mainly use them for my sweaty yoga practice and haven't had any issues yet. Also, they are super easy to hand wash and dry very fast.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: These aren't bad underwear, but they're actually hipsters not cheeksters and ...
customer_reviews.text: These aren't bad underwear, but they're actually hipsters not cheeksters and the fit is different. Otherwise good, just not 100% as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Pictures do not do these justice!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, soft and fits just right! No muffin top or panty line! The pictures do not make these look very comfortable. Much better in person!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kessel

customer_reviews.title: Loose hanging wedgie
customer_reviews.text: They are very lightweight and when I first put them on, they fit to me and felt good. Within 5 hours of wearing, they were a loose hanging wedgie.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fabric, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with these Adidas undies. I typically do not stray form my usual favorites, but thought I would give these a try because I love Adidas socks. They are comfortable all day, leave a very minimal panty line, and the fabric is breathable and stays dry even while working out. They also laundered well. Nice selection of prints too, I'll be collecting all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these undies
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these undies..they dry quickly ..very breathable..im a size between 4 n 6 in american eagle jeans..I ordered a X-XS on these undies..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This are okay underwear for everyday and workouts but they still move around just with regular motion.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I wear them for working out and hiking and have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: tillie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife says the quality is poor, the fit is OK, but she does not like these at all
customer_reviews.author: Russell D.

customer_reviews.title: Still looking for those perfect workout briefs
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but they do ride up a bit during exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Temptor

customer_reviews.title: These Climacool panties are fantastic!! I've worn for high intensity workout sessions ...
customer_reviews.text: These Climacool panties are fantastic!! I've worn for high intensity workout sessions & honestly feel like I don't have any panties on. They are seamless, lightweight & wick away moisture & sweat better then any other underwear I own. They are super comfy to wear & fit true to size - Eileen Burke (Wisconsin)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and they stay put without riding up or down
customer_reviews.author: A Cook

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the most comfortable underwear I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable underwear I've owned. As a runner, I'm really picky about underwear. I bought two to try them out, then bought several more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Moisture wicking and comfy. I wear these to work and never have an issue. Worth the cost per pair.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I didn't want to give any stars you wash it ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to give any stars you wash it once and it gets ruined very expensive for one pair of underwear yet the quality is crap
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, very comfy. Perfect amount of coverage. I usually wear a 10 and the M/L fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Caron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great material with a comfortable stay in place fit even during my long runs!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: They ride up
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Like they aren't even there. Problem is they ride up right when you put them on. At least they are thin material but when it's up there, it's up there. :/
customer_reviews.author: Smilks

customer_reviews.title: I am an active person and was recommended by a friend to try these
customer_reviews.text: I am an active person and was recommended by a friend to try these. I wear them both working out as well as for everyday wear. The climacool fabric is extremely lightweight and comfortable and they do not ride up when I am running, walking or working out. I ordered a M/L and they were true to size. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these underwear
customer_reviews.text: I love these underwear! So comfortable! They have a cotton feel to them and really light weight and airy. I wear them working out, under my scrubs, and really every day. I bought five more of different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Material is soft and comfortable. I wear a size 4-6 and the XS/S fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: No good - choose UA instead
customer_reviews.text: Too snug and the material was of significantly poorer quality than Under Armour Power In Pink Pure Stretch Hipster, which were the same price. Definitely go with the others!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherBeth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Don't expect elasticity to last. That said, it doesn't fall off or anything either.
customer_reviews.author: Jaemin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, sexy, and can have a great workout in them as well
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member 0001

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of underpants!
customer_reviews.text: Very breathable and size L accommodates a 14 comfortably. I got these for working out, but these would be great for camping too as they are quick to dry and easy to wash. I wish they came in more colors and patterns that I like!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome panties!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She wears them while she works out and even on days that she doesn't. Says she loves them, so I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Underwear
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them. Cool and fit perfect. Ordered 4 more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Brucato

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfy. Washes well. Great for sleep, casual wear, and workouts. Stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome running / athletic underwear
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome running / athletic underwear! Super comfortable and do not chafe at all. The small is larger than I expected. The extra/small is what I have bought previously and they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: I’m Loving Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: NOT seamless
customer_reviews.text: The climacool fabric is very effective and is great for working out, but everyone needs to know that these are NOT seamless as described and do bring out panty lines, so take that into consideration when wearing it with leggings or monocoloured bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Chan

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Climacool Cheekster Underwear
product_meta.description: The only pair of undies to wear from waking up to working out and everything in between. the superlite hipster is the lightest, most breathable underwear for sports and every day. stays in place and provides 360° of mesh for that breezy feel. grab your perfect size for the best fit.
feature_bullets: Machine wash in cold with like colors. Non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low
Soft mesh delivers ultimate air flow and stay dry feeling all day long
Lightweight, ultra stretchy fabric stays in place with no riding or rolling
Double-layer mesh liner and tagless finish for total comfort
